info.title: OPERA Cloud Distribution Reservation Notification
info.description:
OPERA Cloud Distribution Reservation Notifications API allows authorized channel partners to create and update reservations for any active property in Oracle Hospitality Distribution (regardless if the property is using OPERA Cloud / OPERA V5 / on-premise PMS Versions). This API is meant to transmit reservations already created and committed in the channel external system and does not perform any Pricing and Availability validation.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 24.3.0.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2024 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

post.description:
Deliver a new reservation from an external system.

OperationId:postReservationNotif

put.description:
Deliver a modification of reservation from an external system.

OperationId:putReservationNotif

post.description:
Deliver a cancellation of reservation from an external system.

OperationId:postCancelReservationNotif

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

o.errorCode.description: HDP error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem.

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

o.errorCode.description: HDP error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem.

creationDate.description: Date and time when this reservation was created, including time zone information. Timestamp as defined in ISO 8601 format and always be in the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (time is UTC).

lastModifyDateTime.description: Date and time when this reservation was last updated, including time zone information. Timestamp as defined in ISO 8601 format and always be in the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (time is UTC).

roomStay.description: List of room stay information including Room Rates, Promotion, Guest Counts and Guarantee

reservationPaymentMethods.description: Reservation Payment Method details including payment Card details.

reservationPackages.description: Details of the Packages added to the reservation.

hotelCode.description: The unique identifier of the Property for which the reservation is created.

printRate.description: Defines if the rate is printed on various correspondence. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

optedForCommunication.description: Defines if guest agreed to receive correspondence from the property via email, phone, letter, etc. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

RoomStayResponseGet.description: List of room stay information including Room Rates, Promotion, Guest Counts and Guarantee

arrivalDate.description: Arrival Date of the Reservation. Value must be of format YYYY-MM-DD

departureDate.description: Departure Date of the Reservation. Value must be of format YYYY-MM-DD

guestCounts.description: Guest Counts details of the reservation.

total.description:
Reservation Total Rate Information
* If the rate plan is configured as tax Inclusive, Amount After Tax is expected in reservation requests.
* If the rate Plan is configured as Tax exclusive, Amount Before Tax is expected in reservation requests.

amountAfterTax.description: Reservation Total Rate including all known taxes, fees and surcharges.

amountBeforeTax.description: Reservation Total Rate excluding all known taxes, fees and surcharges.

guaranteeCode.description:
Accepts Property Guarantee Code.
Either of guaranteeCode or guaranteeType should be provided.
If no guaranteeCode and no guaranteeType is provided the reservation will be created as Non Guaranteed (OTA Code : 38). Both guaranteeType and guaranteeCode should not be sent in a single reservation request; if sent the reservation would be rejected.

guaranteeType.description:
Accepts OTA Standard Guarantee Type.
Possible Values : (5, 8, 19, 22, 38) where 5 = Credit Card, 8 = Deposit, 19 = Travel agency IATA number, 22 = Frequent guest, 38 = None.
Either of guaranteeCode or guaranteeType should be provided.
If no guaranteeType and no guaranteeCode is provided the reservation will be created as Non Guaranteed (OTA Code : 38). Both guaranteeType and guaranteeCode should not be sent in a single reservation request; if sent the reservation would be rejected.

onHold.description: If true indicates this Guarantee Code is used only to hold the inventory during reservation process.

printRate.description: Defines if the rate is printed on various correspondence. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

RoomRateResponseGet.description: The room rate response object for get

ratePlanType.description: The rate plan type associated with the rate plan.

ratePlanName.description: The name of the rate plan.

ratePlanLevel.description: The rate level the rate plan is associated to.

ratePlanCategory.description: The rate category the rate plan is associated to.

identificationRequired.description: Indicates if an ID is required during the Check-In for this rate booking

mealPlan.description: Type of meal plan the rate plan includes

mealsIncluded.description: Type of meal plan the rate plan includes

RatePlanMealPlanType.description: Type of meal plan the rate plan includes

GdsDescription.description: Multi line description of the rate plan.

line1.description: First line of rate plan description.
line1.example: Room Only Rate with free wifi

line2.description: Second line of rate plan description.

line3.description: Third line of rate plan description.

detailedDescription.description: Detailed information about the rate plan.
detailedDescription.example: An outdoor pool is also available for guests staying at the lodge during the summertime.

lastModifyDateTime.description: Date and time when this reservation was last updated, including time zone information. Timestamp as defined in ISO 8601 format and always be in the following format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (time is UTC).

hotelCode.description: The unique identifier of the Property for which the reservation is created.

id.description: Global reservation number from external channel. Maximum length is 50 alphanumeric characters without spaces.

idExtension.description: This is the index number for multi leg reservations. Numeric values only.

base.description:
Base Rate Details
* If the rate plan is configured as Tax Inclusive, Amount After Tax is expected in reservation requests.
* If the rate Plan is configured as Tax exclusive, Amount Before Tax is expected in reservation requests.

amountAfterTax.description: Room Rate including all known taxes, fees and surcharges.

amountBeforeTax.description: Room Rate excluding all known taxes, fees and surcharges.

start.description:
Effective Start Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

end.description:
Effective End Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

roomType.description: Room Type Code for which the reservation is requested for.

ratePlanCode.description:
* Rate Plan Code for which the reservation is requested.
* Rate plan code is mandatory for Transient ( non Block) reservation requests.
* Rate Plan Code is optional if the reservation is for a Business Block.

roomId.description: Room Number to be assigned to the reservation.

suppressRate.description: Used to suppress the display of the room rate in various correspondence. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

numberOfUnits.description: Number of rooms to be booked for this reservation

marketCode.description: The code that relates to the market being sold to (e.g., the corporate market, packages).

sourceCode.description: To specify where the business came from e.g.radio, newspaper ad, etc.

start.description:
Effective Start Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

end.description:
Effective End Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

roomType.description: Room Type Code for which the reservation is requested for.

* Rate Plan Code for which the reservation is requested.
* Rate plan code is mandatory for Transient ( non Block) reservation requests.
* Rate Plan Code is optional if the reservation is for a Business Block.

suppressRate.description: Used to suppress the display of the room rate in various correspondence. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

numberOfUnits.description: Number of rooms to be booked for this reservation

sourceCode.description: To specify where the business came from e.g.radio, newspaper ad, etc.

start.description:
Effective Start Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

end.description:
Effective End Date of the room rate.
* Value must be of format 'date'

internal.description: When true, the comment may not be shown to the consumer. When false, the comment may be shown to the consumer. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'. Default value is false

departureDate.description: Departure Date of the Reservation. Value must be of format YYYY-MM-DD

promotion.description: Details of Promotion attached to the reservation.

promotionCode.description: Promotion code associated with the promotional offers.

guestCounts.description: Guest Counts details of the reservation.

Accepts OTA Standard Guarantee Type.
Possible Values : (5, 8, 19, 22, 38) where 5 = Credit Card, 8 = Deposit, 19 = Travel agency IATA number, 22 = Frequent guest, 38 = None.
Either of guaranteeCode or guaranteeType should be provided.
If no guaranteeType and no guaranteeCode is provided the reservation will be created as Non Guaranteed (OTA Code : 38). Both guaranteeType and guaranteeCode should not be sent in a single reservation request; if sent the reservation would be rejected.

onHold.description: If true indicates this Guarantee Code is used only to hold the inventory during reservation process.

printRate.description: Defines if the rate is printed on various correspondence. Possible values are 'true' or 'false'.

primary.description: Indicates if the profile is primary if multiple profiles of the same type are being sent. Should be true by default if only one profile of same type is sent

arrivalTransport.description: Arrival Transport details of the Guest

departureTransport.description: Departure Transport details of the Guest

primary.description: Indicates if the profile is primary if multiple profiles of the same type are being sent. Should be true by default if only one profile of same type is sent

arrivalTransport.description: Arrival Transport details of the Guest

departureTransport.description: Departure Transport details of the Guest

comments.description: Any additional info regarding the travel can be sent here

type.description: Method of conveyance of the guest. For Ex : Air, Rail, Bus, Private Auto, Boat, Other

transportCode.description: Enter the transportation Code such as the airline flight number/city of origin applicable to the guest mode of transportation upon arrival. For example Flight 1660

carrierCode.description: Enter the code associated with the air, rail, bus or car rental transport company being used by this guest at arrival; for example, Delta, Amtrak, Greyhound, Avis.

stationCode.description: Enter the code for the airport, bus station or other location of the guest arrival; for example, JFK International, Penn Station, Port Authority Bus Terminal.

transportationReqd.description: Indicates if transportation is required or not

id.description: The unique ID associated with that profile

idContext.description: The Context of the ID sent above. Possible Values : Central

type.description: The type of profile being sent Possible Values : Guest, TravelAgent, Source, Company

id.description: The unique ID associated with that profile

idContext.description: The Context of the ID sent above. Possible Values : Central

type.description: The type of profile being sent Possible Values : Guest, TravelAgent, Source, Company and Profile

companyName.description: Name of the associated Company, Source or Travel Agent

ProfileType.description: The type of profile being sent

postalCode.description: Postal Code of the Guest Address

code.description: Supported codes for countries are ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 values only, ie. US, not USA.

CurrencyCode.description:
The rate currency code. This should be ISO currency code.
  *  Matches regex pattern: [A-Z]{3}
  *  Length of string must be less than, or equal to 3
  *  Length of string must be greater than, or equal to 3

paymentMethod.description: Indicated how the payment would be done Possible Values : 5 (for Credit Card) and 1 (for Cash)

folioView.description: folio number for payment method (example: use 1 for guest guarantee, 2 for company/travel agent guarantee)

Promotion.description: Details of Promotion attached to the reservation.

promotionCode.description: Promotion code associated with the promotional offers.

packageCode.description: Package code. This is the unique code used for the package and is a required element.

startDate.description: Required value when changing a reservation package. If the original start date was null, then null is required.

endDate.description: Required value when changing a reservation package. If the original end date was null, then null is required.

id.description: Unique OPERA Block ID which is a primary identification of a Block in OPERA.

type.description: Type of the Block Id. Valid value 'BlockCode'

consumptionDate.description: The date the package was used or can be used.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of the package.

totalQuantity.description: The total quantity of the package for this date, calculated based on the calculation rule as defined in the PackageHeaderType

reservationDate.description: The date of the Reservation when this package is applicable. This can be different from the date the package will be consumed. Example are next day packages. Reservation date is when the package is applied to the guest and Consumption date is when the guest can consume the package.

ReservationMembership.description: Details of the membership added to the reservation.

membershipLevel.description: Code that designates this membership level.

membershipType.description: The membership type belonging to the program the guest is enrolled with

cardNumber.description: Full Card Number or the Card Token

cardOrToken.description: This contains information on whether credit card is tokenized (token enabled). A value of 'Token' indicates cardNumber holds token value and 'CardNumber' indicates cardNumber holds credit card number.

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

hotelCodePath.name: hotelCode
hotelCodePath.description: The unique identifier of the Property for which the reservation is created.

tags.name: Reservation Notification
tags.description:
Reservation Notification API operations allow a channel to deliver, modify and cancel a reservation created and already confirmed from an external system (for example an OTA).
It is usually used in conjunction with OPERA Cloud Distribution ARI Publication that allows channel partners to receive ARI information from the property.
For these operations, API will perform minimal technical validations as reservation details are already committed to the guests in the originating external system.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
